page.title: 03One farm in our area.
page.content: The farm belongs to{Mr Mager}and it is a Manley Dairy farm with 111 acres or 44.9 hectares of land.{Mr Mager}has been farming 16 years.It is mainly a dairy farm.They grow grass,wheat, barley and potatoes.They have 2 tractors with various equipment,1 combine,a baler and a silarater.On average they keep cows 12 years.A dairy cow is worth about Â£400,a week old calf is worth about Â£70 and a 2 year old fat bull is worth about Â£70.The milking times are 5.30 am and 3.30 pm.{Mr Mager}works for 11\ hours each day in that time he works the land and milks the cows twice each day.When{Mr Mager}was younger he went to Sutton on Sea County Primary School and to the Grammar School in Alford.
